Welcome to the Queensland Treasury Corporation (QTC) investor app. Here you can access regularly updated information in one location, including market announcements, presentations and publications.

Please tell us a bit about yourself so we can create the best app experience.

This will also be your username

Welcome to the Invest in QTC app

This special app is designed to provide institutional fixed income investors with regular, updated content from QTC in one location.

The simple library interface enables you to download the latest QTC news including market announcements, presentations and publications direct to your device.
